version_description:
- Vote in the True Inspiration Awards. These awards honor organizations that support innovative education, emerging leadership development, and youth entrepreneurship.
- Treat notifications! Now get notified when you receive a new treat. We packed a bunch of other improvements to treats in the version as well.
- Menu nutrition information. Now tap on the "Nutrition" link from each menu item and see the nutrition information for that specific item.
- Fixed additional bugs related to issues when logging into the app.
- bug fixes to mobile ordering and login

What's New in 5.5:
- Cow Calendars are now integrated into Chick-fil-A One! Use the app to see each month's treat and redeem in mobile orders or by scanning the Cow Calendar Card in app!
- Treat progress is now on the home screen with a new Treat mini card. See your progress from the home screen.
- New mobile ordering check in flow to make it easier at each step.
- New password strength indicator to help create stronger, unique passwords.
- Even more bug fixes and enhancements.

What's New in 5.6
- TouchID for login! Now, once you enable TouchID, you can use it any time to login to the app.
- Improved new account experience.
- Improved check out for mobile orders.
- Even more bug fixes and enhancements in this release.

- fixed a crash for some users on iOS 8
- resolve a few more bugs introduced in our last update. We hope this makes a smoother experience for those people seeing issues.

What's new in 5.7:
Login is now easier! You can use Facebook and Google to create your account and login.
We are now verifying email addresses to make sure you get FREE treat notifications.
You can now search for help items with text search in Get Help.
Squashed some bugs in this dot release. Thank you for downloading our app!

- A new on boarding experience that gives new users tips along their first few app experiences.
- A revamped home screen card to make ordering and treats quicker to access
- A new preference center for push notifications. Access through settings gear icon on the home screen.
- Lots of small enhancements to improve stability and connectivity.
- Fixed a bug that improves performance when checking gift card balances.

What’s New:
- We’re celebrating free treats. If you’ve earned or received a new treat, we’ll alert you when the next time you open the app.
- For a limited time, earn bonus treats progress when you place mobile orders. See a visual breakdown of any bonus progress earned in the treat tracker.
- Never miss a treat. Push notifications now include new treats you’ve earned or received as well as notifications for treats expiring soon. Manage your personal push notification preferences by tapping settings in the app. To enable push notifications, visit your device’s notification settings.
- Squashed a few bugs to improve app stability.

Squashed a few bugs to improve app stability.

From our latest major release:
- We’re celebrating free treats. If you’ve earned or received a new treat, we’ll alert you when the next time you open the app.
- For a limited time, earn bonus treats progress when you place mobile orders. See a visual breakdown of any bonus progress earned in the treat tracker.
- Never miss a treat. Push notifications now include new treats you’ve earned or received as well as notifications for treats expiring soon. Manage your personal push notification preferences by tapping settings in the app. To enable push notifications, visit your device’s notification settings.

We've enhanced the feedback options available after you place a mobile order. After you receive your order, tell us about your experience.
We also spent some quality time on stability and performance enhancements.

Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Thank you for downloading Chick-fil-A One!
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Updated treat experience to make finding and redeeming free Chick-fil-A even easier!

Thank you for updating the Chick-fil-A One app!
We have added better clarity on the wait involved with ordering lunch items during breakfast.
Also, included are bug fixes and stability improvements.
Critical bug fixes and stability improvements
Critical bug fixes
Critical bug fixes
A few more bug fixes and performance improvements.

Big improvements to how favorite restaurants are selected. We let you select exactly how many restaurants you want in your favorites list instead of selecting from frequently visited locations.
Mobile order restaurant confirmation has moved to the beginning of mobile orders instead of when viewing the My Order screen for the first time.
Lots of other improvements to the location selection and account creation screens.
Bug fixes and performance improvements. Thank you for downloading Chick-fil-A One!
Bug fixes and performance improvements. Thank you for downloading Chick-fil-A One!
Bug fixes and performance improvements. Thank you for downloading Chick-fil-A One!

⁃ We’ve revamped our membership program to give you more choices and more benefits.

⁃ New Chick-fil-A One membership program – Earn points, redeem rewards, and unlock special benefits as you reach new tiers.

⁃ We have redesigned the look for an easier ordering experience.

⁃ Improved ordering process – Quickly find a location, place an order, and pick up your food, all with clear and simple instructions.

⁃ We’ve revamped our membership program to give you more choices and more benefits.

⁃ New Chick-fil-A One membership program – Earn points, redeem rewards, and unlock special benefits as you reach new tiers.

⁃ We have redesigned the look for an easier ordering experience.

⁃ Improved ordering process – Quickly find a location, place an order, and pick up your food, all with clear and simple instructions.

⁃ We’ve revamped our membership program to give you more choices and more benefits.

⁃ New Chick-fil-A One membership program – Earn points, redeem rewards, and unlock special benefits as you reach new tiers.

⁃ We have redesigned the look for an easier ordering experience.

⁃ Improved ordering process – Quickly find a location, place an order, and pick up your food, all with clear and simple instructions.

- One of our most popular requests: we have added the ability to request credit for a missing transaction when you forget to scan your app. From your Transaction History, you can now tap, "Submit a missed transaction" and enter the receipt details.

- Numerous bug fixes and user experience improvements across the app.

- We've added a banner that appears if you are no longer connected to the internet and therefore can't contact our servers.
- This release also fixes an intermittent bug that caused some users to be logged out unintentionally.
- New users can now successfully enter their birth date on the account profile.

- Support for iOS 12!
- Fixed an issue that occasionally caused calories to display incorrectly
- Restaurants will now correctly show as open or closed based on the restaurant's time zone
- Fixed an issue that was causing some users trouble when trying to add a reward to their mobile order

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- The ordering menu now has enhanced alerting to better help guests understand why certain food items may be unavailable at a particular time of day.
- Light updates to the “Points” screen will help guests better differentiate between their current membership status and their progress toward a status for the upcoming loyalty year.
- Available at participating restaurants, we’ve introduced an entirely rebuilt and redesigned native experience for placing and receiving Delivery orders that we hope our guests will love!
- We have resolved an intermittent crash that a select number of users may have been experiencing on app launch; we apologize for the inconvenience.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.
Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! This release includes some minor bug fixes to help make your app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- Accidentally arrived at the wrong restaurant? We now automatically detect if you arrive at a different restaurant from where you mobile ordered and allow you to move that order to the new restaurant when you check in.
- Side items and drinks will now display more prominently to help you find items quickly.
- We added a handful of bug fixes and performance improvements, including one that resolves a crash some users were seeing, to make everyone's app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! This release includes a handful of bug fixes that we hope will further improve your app experience!
- The “View Reward” button on a new reward announcement is once again interactive!
- We resolved an issue that was causing some new users to have trouble submitting free orders.
- We have also fixed two crashes that were occurring in the restaurant finder.

Thank you for using the Chick-fil-A app!
- You can now rename Favorite orders with the new Favorite detail view. Tap the favorite and then tap Rename from the top toolbar.
- We added additional messaging when ordering certain items during breakfast to indicate they take much longer to prepare.
- There are a bunch of bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

- Introducing Favorite Orders! You can now save current and past mobile orders as favorites for easier ordering in the future.
- Name favorite orders for easier reference.
- Order quickly from the new Favorites section with all your saved orders.
- Once saved, favorite orders can be deleted. Editing favorites is on the way!
- The number of reward points earned has been added to the transaction history.
- Special instructions for mobile orders are now included when viewing the details of past orders.
- You can now choose a different payment method when checking in mobile orders if there is an issue when processing payment.
We hope you're enjoying Chick-fil-A One! In this release, we added in various bug fixes and performance improvements throughout the app to help make your experience the best it can be.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- We added tactile feedback when adding a favorite to your order
- Google restaurant reviews have been added to the store info screen
- Updated icons for restaurant type when selecting a restaurant to better indicate the dining experience
- Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements to make the app a better experience

- Back by popular demand! You can now edit items once you have added them to the cart.
- Breakfast items will now properly be cleaned up from your cart when trying to order after breakfast has ended
- Lots of performance improvements across the app.
We hope you're enjoying Chick-fil-A One! In this release, we added in various bug fixes and performance improvements throughout the app to help make your experience the best it can be.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
This release resolves an issue that was causing the app to crash for some users after submitting their order.

Thanks for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! In this latest update, we added the following:
- Enhanced notification badging to better help indicate when you have unseen rewards or announcements
- A handful of bug fixes, including a few that resolve some issues around changing your restaurant before submitting an order and one that was causing a crash for some users after submitting an order

- Introducing Favorite Orders! You can now save current and past mobile orders as favorites for easier ordering in the future.
- Name favorite orders for easier reference.
- Order quickly from the new Favorites section with all your saved orders.
- Once saved, favorite orders can be deleted. Editing favorites is on the way!
- The number of reward points earned has been added to the transaction history.
- Special instructions for mobile orders are now included when viewing the details of past orders.
- You can now choose a different payment method when checking in mobile orders if there is an issue when processing payment.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- We added tactile feedback when adding a favorite to your order
- Google restaurant reviews have been added to the store info screen
- Updated icons for restaurant type when selecting a restaurant to better indicate the dining experience
- Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements to make the app a better experience

Thank you for using the Chick-fil-A app!
- You can now rename Favorite orders with the new Favorite detail view. Tap the favorite and then tap Rename from the top toolbar.
- We added additional messaging when ordering certain items during breakfast to indicate they take much longer to prepare.
- There are a bunch of bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- Accidentally arrived at the wrong restaurant? We now automatically detect if you arrive at a different restaurant from where you mobile ordered and allow you to move that order to the new restaurant when you check in.
- Side items and drinks will now display more prominently to help you find items quickly.
- We added a handful of bug fixes and performance improvements, including one that resolves a crash some users were seeing, to make everyone's app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- Accidentally arrived at the wrong restaurant? We now automatically detect if you arrive at a different restaurant from where you mobile ordered and allow you to move that order to the new restaurant when you check in.
- Side items and drinks will now display more prominently to help you find items quickly.
- We added a handful of bug fixes and performance improvements, including one that resolves a crash some users were seeing, to make everyone's app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- Finding a restaurant is now easier than ever with a newly updated restaurant selector!
- The new restaurant selector screen allows you to distinguish between catering and mobile orders, use filters to find restaurants, and explore the updated restaurant detail page.
- We’ve also added a handful of bug fixes and performance improvements, including a few to resolve some irregular crashes.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- This release fixes a few minor bugs in the restaurant finder, including one that occasionally caused favorite restaurants to be sorted incorrectly.
- As always, we've added some performance improvements to further enhance your app experience!

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- This release resolves an intermittent crash that some users may have experienced after submitting an order.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- This release addresses a crash some users may have experienced when attempting to sign in.
- We have also resolved an intermittent crash that some users may have experienced after submitting an order.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! We’ve added lots of new features in this release that we hope you will love!
- Streamline your ordering experience by setting a default payment method. You can also now customize the names of your payment methods to help identify them more quickly
- Guests may now choose whether or not they would like to redeem any available rewards when scanning at the restaurant
- The Points screen has been refreshed to better help guests understand how many more points they must earn to achieve the next membership level
- We resolved an issue that was causing menu headers to display improperly on some devices
- We’ve made some under-the-hood adjustments to the restaurant finder that we hope will make it even easier and faster to find a Chick-fil-A
- As always, we’ve resolved some irregular crashes and included numerous other performance improvements to further enhance your app experience

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! This release includes a handful of bug fixes that we hope will further improve your app experience!
- The “View Reward” button on a new reward announcement is once again interactive!
- We resolved an issue that was causing some new users to have trouble submitting free orders.
- We have also fixed two crashes that were occurring in the restaurant finder.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- When changing your selected restaurant after items are already in your cart, any unavailable items will now be removed individually instead of requiring a whole new order to be created!
- New membership information alerts will help guests better understand when their membership tier status may lapse or rollover
- The “Order Received” timeline step after submitting an order has been removed to help guests get their food even faster
- As always, we’ve resolved some irregular crashes and included numerous other performance improvements to further enhance your app experience

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- The ordering menu now has enhanced alerting to better help guests understand why certain food items may be unavailable at a particular time of day.
- Light updates to the “Points” screen will help guests better differentiate between their current membership status and their progress toward a status for the upcoming loyalty year.
- Available at participating restaurants, we’ve introduced an entirely rebuilt and redesigned native experience for placing and receiving Delivery orders that we hope our guests will love!
- We have resolved an intermittent crash that a select number of users may have been experiencing on app launch; we apologize for the inconvenience.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.
Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! This release includes some minor bug fixes to help make your app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- Enjoy an all-new experience after submitting your carry-out order!
- Back by popular demand, see your total lifetime points earned on the “Points” screen!
- We’ve made some enhancements to the restaurant finder to help make the results more predictable and accurate.
- An intermittent issue some users were experiencing when moving a mobile order has been resolved.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- We’ve resolved an issue that was causing some users to not progress appropriately through the series of steps after submitting an order.
- Enjoy an all-new experience after submitting a curbside or drive-thru order!
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- This release includes some small adjustments and enhancements to improve the experience for users on devices with the latest version of iOS.
- We’ve made some small changes to the experience after submitting an order to better communicate order-related details to our guests.
- “Special instructions” fields have been improved to provide more clarity around how they are intended to be used when either adding an item or completing an order.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- Redeem points for rewards directly from the ordering cart! Guests will now be notified if there are items in their cart that they could get for free by using points.
- Additional notices will now display throughout the ordering process to better inform guests when a restaurant’s breakfast hours are about to end or when a restaurant will be closing soon.
- We’ve resolved an issue where the scheduled time for a delivery order could not be changed when breakfast was about to end.
Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! This release includes some minor bug fixes and performance improvements to help make your app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- We’ve added the ability for users to choose a different pickup method even after submitting their order!
- Additional notices will better inform users when the restaurant is closed or closing soon.
- The log-in and account creation processes have been improved to make using a social account even more seamless.
- For restaurants that offer delivery, delivery hours will now display accurately when selecting a pickup method.
- Additionally, we’ve introduced numerous other enhancements, bug fixes, and performance improvements.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- We’ve improved the “Recent” menu to better highlight item customizations and to better inform guests when an item may not be available at a specific restaurant or at a specific time.
- Multiple minor enhancements have been added to the experience after submitting an order to better serve our guests!
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- Select your pickup method with one tap! Customers will no longer need to press “Continue” after choosing their desired mobile order pickup method.
- We’ve continued to enhance the experience after submitting an order in an effort to provide even better service for our Customers.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.
Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app! This release includes some minor bug fixes and performance improvements to help make your app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A app!
- At participating restaurants, Customers will now be given the option to place an order for delivery through one of our partner services.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- Customers can now specify their vehicle’s make to help Team Members more quickly identify them when placing drive-thru and curbside orders.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- New users can create an account using Sign In with Apple!
- We’ve made some improvements to the experience when finding a restaurant to make it faster, more reliable, and more accurate.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- Quickly choose pickup or delivery based on an individual restaurant’s offerings when starting your order!
- The experience after submitting an order has been adjusted to better highlight the options available to Customers.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- Introducing a brand new delivery experience! Select “Deliver to me” and enter your address to find restaurants that deliver directly from our door to yours through either Chick-fil-A Team Member Delivery or through one of our national 3rd party delivery partners. Select “Pickup at restaurant” to mobile order through the drive-thru, curbside, or carry-out, as available.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App! This release improves support for the latest versions of iOS, and it includes some minor bug fixes and performance improvements to help make your app experience better.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- We’ve been working hard on the menu browsing experience to make the ordering process even faster and more convenient!
- Updated look and feel on Favorites and Recents will add even more clarity about just how you’ve customized your favorite items. Additionally, we’ve now added the ability to “Customize” a recently ordered item in case you want to make a slight change from how you ordered it last time.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!

- Updated look and feel on Favorites and Recents will add even more clarity about just how you’ve customized your favorite items. Additionally, we’ve now added the ability to “Customize” a recently ordered item in case you want to make a slight change from how you ordered it last time.
- This release resolves an issue that was causing users to have trouble when attempting to redeem certain types of rewards.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- We’ve resolved an issue that some users were experiencing when attempting to customize the type of bun their sandwich was prepared with.
- The “Nutrition & Allergens” section of the menu item configuration screen has been redesigned to simplify it and make it easier for Customers to understand.
- We’ve made some enhancements to the check-in experience so that receiving your food is easier and more enjoyable.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App! This release contains a handful of bug fixes and performance improvements, a few of which are noted below:
- Customers who have set a custom default web browser will no longer experience issues when opening some links from within the app.
- We’ve resolved an intermittent visual bug in which the screen would “zoom out” and not return to its original state when attempting to redeem a reward.
- Maximum order sizes are now enforced when adding items, so Customers will experience fewer errors from within the ordering cart.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- We’ve improved the sign-in and account creation experience to reduce the number of steps required for Customers.
- Customers can now manage their delivery addresses and update special instructions from within the “Account” tab.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- Introducing Favorite Items! Just tap the heart after customizing a meal or individual item to add it as a Favorite for quick and easy reordering.
- We’ve resolved an issue that caused some users to see incorrect price requirements in delivery orders.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

- We’ve made some small enhancements to the experience after submitting an order to better highlight the current step in the fulfillment process.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

- We’ve completely redesigned the experience when redeeming points for Rewards! Enjoy an entirely new look and feel, with new features that will help you find exactly what you’re looking for.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.

Thank you for downloading the Chick-fil-A App!
- Customers can now view and select “Recently ordered from” restaurants when beginning an order.
- Redeeming points for rewards from within the ordering cart is now easier than ever! Now, each item that is eligible for redemption will be individually marked, so Customers can conveniently redeem as many points as they like.
- The images of meal items in the ordering cart have been enhanced to now include images of the selected side item and drink.
- As always, we’ve added other less-visible bug fixes and performance improvements to further enhance your app experience.
